topic: Importance of diverse information sources in shaping energy policy perspectives
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that my current assumptions may be incomplete due to potential cognitive biases and a lack of diverse perspectives. As a next step, I will actively seek out and engage with viewpoints that differ from my own, possibly by reading articles from varied sources or discussing the topic with people who have different experiences. This will help me challenge my assumptions, gain a broader understanding, and refine my perspective.
